data.title: Love Affair | Full Movie | Movies Anywhere
data.meta_description: Purchase Love Affair on digital and stream instantly or download offline. Academy Award-winners Warren Beatty and Annette Bening star in this classic romantic tale of lovers torn apart by fate. Engaged to marry others, star-crossed lovers Mike Gambril (Beatty) and Terry McKay (Bening) vow to meet again only if they still love each other. But Terry suffers a tragic accident on her way to their rendezvous, and Mike believes her passion waned ... unaware of the injury with which his true love struggles.
data.text:
Love Affair' takes such pains to dodge vulgarity it forgets to put anything in its place.

February 21, 2018

Ironically ... Beatty and Bening's '94 film sticks too closely to the plot of its three-hanky predecessors, when it should have aimed for something a little more current.

September 24, 2021

A very romantic, very loyal retelling of the classic love story

June 21, 2017
